arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola gives praise to Marcelino
arts.sum: Marcelino is a well-respected coach across LaLiga, who has excelled in previous spells at Villarreal and Valencia . When you see a Marcelino team without knowing Marcelino is on the bench, you recognize his style of play.

arts.ttl: Villarreal v Manchester City: Big boost with late recovery for Champions League clash
arts.sum: Villarreal have been handed a late boost for their clash with Manchester City this evening after Juan Foyth returned to training. AS cover the situation today, reporting the centre-back has recovered in time for the Champions League clash. The Argentine has been missing from Villarreal’s squad for several weeks due to muscle problems. arts.ttl: ‘Won’t be a stroll’: Reasons Man City should be wary and confident before Villarreal UCL clash
arts.sum: Manchester City should be confident of success in Tuesday’s Champions League clash with Villarreal, but it is “not going to be a stroll” for Pep Guardiola’s side, Citizens expert Steven McInerney tells Sports Mole.
